Build-Depends: debhelper-compat (= 13), dh-sequence-python3, pybuild-plugin-pyproject, python3-all, python3-pytest <!nocheck>, python3-setuptools, python3-setuptools-scm
Description: plugin and hook calling mechanisms for Python pluggy is the crystallized core of plugin management and hook calling for pytest. It enables 1400+ plugins to extend and customize pytest’s default behaviour. Even pytest itself is composed as a set of pluggy plugins which are invoked in sequence according to a well defined set of protocols. . It gives users the ability to extend or modify the behaviour of a host program by installing a plugin for that program. The plugin code will run as part of normal program execution, changing or enhancing certain aspects of it.
